title: President Bukele champions El Salvador’s multiple Bitcoin revenue streams
description:
Nayyib Bukele, the President of El Salvador, revealed that the Central American nation generates multiple Bitcoin revenues from various channels alongside its BTC holdings. In a Mar 11. post on social media platform X (formerly Twitter), the president outlined four additional sources of Bitcoin revenue for the government, including: Revenue from its passport program. Income […]

The post President Bukele champions El Salvador’s multiple Bitcoin revenue streams appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: MetaCene Announces $10 Million Private A Round Funding, Securing Its Place as a Web3 Gaming Pioneer
description: Singapore, 13-03-2024, BlockmanPR – MetaCene, the leading meta-MMO platform for all gamers, is redefining the boundaries of digital ownership and creativity. Today, it proudly announces the closure of its $10 million Private A round funding. title: Injective Protocol (INJ) and Toncoin (TON) buck the crypto downtrend
description: Tuesday sees most altcoins in the red as the markets wait for the release of the CPI data later today. However, two altcoin gems are bucking the red trend. Injective Protocol (INJ) and Toncoin (TON) continue to thrive.

title: Dubai police embrace Cardano blockchain for crime prevention
description: Dubai’s police department has initiated a strategic partnership with the Cardano Foundation. This collaboration aims to leverage blockchain technology to bolster security measures on a global scale. During the recent World Police Summit held in Dubai, the Dubai Police unveiled a groundbreaking pilot project, showcasing their capacity to securely share crucial data from criminal investigations […]

title: White House Predicts Bitcoin Surge to $250,000: Expert Insights Unveiled
description: Pierre Rochard predicts Bitcoin could hit $250k by 2035 based on Biden’s budget, sparking debate in the crypto community. title: XRP and Cardano Investors Set Sights on BlastUP Promising Presale
description:

description:
